name: The 2021 4th International Conference on Big Data and Education
content: Paper publication: Accepted papers of ICBDE 2021 after proper registration and presentation will be published in the conference proceedings by ACM, which will be included in ACM Digital Library and indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc. ICBDE 2021 Conference Proceedings: ISBN: 978-1-4503-8938-9
